MLB Event Types

Source: R/mlb_event_types.R
mlb_event_types.Rd

MLB Event Types

Usage

mlb_event_types()

Value

Returns a data frame with the following columns

col_nametypes
plate_appearancelogical
hitlogical
event_codecharacter
base_running_eventlogical
event_descriptioncharacter

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(mlb_event_types())
#>    plate_appearance   hit                   event_code
#> 1             FALSE FALSE                   pickoff_1b
#> 2             FALSE FALSE                   pickoff_2b
#> 3             FALSE FALSE                   pickoff_3b
